item.title: 7.3 Object Permission Management - Pre-authentication
item.description: 7.3 Object Permission Management - Pre-Authenticated Requests Pre-Authenticated Requests is a function that allows users to access buckets or objects without authentication. It is created as a temporary shared link that allows you to access the Bucket or Object without authentication until the specified period. This shared link will make it accessible to any user. Access to Object URL In the Object Details screen, check the URL path of the object.
